snippet: MacEACHRON--Allison Bailey. In loving memory. On the 1st anniversary of her death, March 8, 2015. You are in God's hands. The precious memories that made our wonderful life together remain untouched. I miss you. We all do. Love, Fred 1/3
lead_paragraph: MacEACHRON--Allison Bailey. In loving memory. On the 1st anniversary of her death, March 8, 2015. You are in God's hands. The precious memories that made our wonderful life together remain untouched. I miss you. We all do. Love, Fred 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  MACEACHRON, ALLISON BAILEY
